# Documented claims



```{julia}
#| echo: false
#| output: false

```

Use the same toy vault as other examples with notes on a couple of presidents:

```{julia}
using Obsidian, ObsidianGenealogy
dir = joinpath(repo,"test", "assets", "presidents-vault")
genvault = genealogyVault(dir)
```
